00038 ultimix.dialog.AddOpener = function( Opener , Selector , DataAcceptor , StatusAcceptor , DataSource , BeforeOpenValidation )
00039 {
00040       if( Opener )
00041       {
00042             if( jQuery( Opener ).length )
00043             {
00044                   var   Items = jQuery( Opener );
00045 
00046                   for( var i = 0 ; i < Items.length ; i++ )
00047                   {
00048                         var               OpenDialogFunction = function()
00049                         {
00050                               ultimix.dialog.OpenDialog( Selector , DataAcceptor , StatusAcceptor , DataSource , BeforeOpenValidation );
00051                         }
00052                         
00053                         jQuery( Items[ i ] ).unbind( 'click' );
00054                         jQuery( Items[ i ] ).click( OpenDialogFunction );
00055                         
00056                         if( jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'tagName' ) == 'A' )
00057                         {
00058                               jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'href' , '#' );
00059                         }
00060                         
00061                         if( jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'tagName' ) == 'INPUT' || jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'tagName' ) == 'TEXTAREA' )
00062                         {
00063                               jQuery( Items[ i ] ).unbind( 'focus' );
00064                               jQuery( Items[ i ] ).focus( OpenDialogFunction );
00065                         }
00066                   }
00067             }
00068       }
00069 }

00086 ultimix.dialog.OpenDialog = function( Selector , DataAcceptor , StatusAcceptor , DataSource , BeforeOpenValidation )
00087 {
00088       jQuery( Selector ).attr( 'data_acceptor' , DataAcceptor );
00089       jQuery( Selector ).attr( 'status_acceptor' , StatusAcceptor );
00090       jQuery( Selector ).attr( 'data_source' , DataSource );
00091       
00092       if( BeforeOpenValidation && BeforeOpenValidation() == false )
00093       {
00094             return;
00095       }
00096 
00097       scroll( 0 , 0 );
00098       jQuery( Selector ).dialog( 'open' );
00099       jQuery( Selector ).dialog( { position: [ 'center' , 'center' ] } );
00100 }
